name: Pet Doge
description: Such amaze, much game. Pet Doge A masterpeice of gaming. 5/5 - Idiot This game gave me depression - No one Pet Doge is voted as the best game ever made. In this game doge will go back an forth. You must pet him to earn doge coin. Defeat buff doge and please our former gods. Use arrow keys to move and space to pet. I hate this game 0/5 - Somebody
